services.name: Sofa Cleaning
services.description: Deep cleaning for all types of sofas. Removes stains, odors, and allergens for a fresh, clean living space.

services.name: Mattress Cleaning
services.description: Professional mattress sanitization and deep cleaning for a healthier sleep environment.

services.name: Chair Cleaning
services.description: Individual chair cleaning service. Perfect for dining chairs, office chairs, and recliners.

services.name: Small Rug Cleaning
services.description: Thorough cleaning for area rugs up to 5x8 feet. Restores colors and removes embedded dirt.

services.name: Pressure Washing
services.description: High-pressure cleaning for patios, driveways, sidewalks, and exterior surfaces.
